full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Tokyo and Asian-Pacific Property Management

#### Tender Details

* Tender ID: WS4566315769
* Solicitation ID: WS4566315769
* Reference Number: 08281-220124B
* Amendment Number: 6
* Tender Closing Date: Wednesday, July 3rd, 2024, at 14:00 HNE
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1st, 2025
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31st, 2030

#### Contract Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is seeking a Property Management, Project Delivery, and other related Optional Services for Canada's diplomatic buildings in Japan that form part of Canada's Mission to Japan.

#### Contract Location

* Japan
* Canada

#### Contract Categories

* Procurement Category: SRV
* UNSPSC: 80161601 - Property management services

#### Notice Type and Method

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

For any questions or information regarding this tender, please contact:

Marie-Ève Bouchard
SPAC/PSPC
marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be accessed through the following link:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19578816?extsite=MTk1Nzg4MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: To access the tender documents, you may need to register
